get.description:
Operation to Fetch Future Past Exchange Rates.

OperationId:getFuturePastExchangeRates

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel in OPERA

200.description: Collection of exchange rates and their information.

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

futurePastExchangeRates.description: Collection of exchange rates and their information.

hotelId.description: Property where exchange rate is set.

beginDate.description: Date on which the rate is to become active.

buyCommission.description: Percentage of the amount that is to be a commission for the currency buy operation.

sellCommission.description: Percentage of the amount that is to be a commission for the currency sell operation.

comment.description: Comments associated with the exchange rate.
